original: @200b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @200b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ku ru kulle s'a dha nam shr'i he badzra tantrod dhi tam /
analyzed: ku ru kulle s'a dha nam shr'i he badzra tantrod dhi tam /
translated: Kurukulle-sadhana-shri-hevajra-tantra-uddhrita

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud las bton pa /
analyzed: rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud las bton pa /
translated: The Kurukulle Sadhana Extracted from the Hevajra Tantra

original: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Kurukulle.

original: dang por rab sad snum zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer mi bzad dpal gyi snang ba yang dag 'phro ba can //
analyzed: dang por rab sad snum zhing nyi ma'i 'od zer mi bzad dpal gyi snang ba yang dag 'phro ba can //
translated: First, fully awakened, with oily hair, radiating the unbearable splendor of the sun's rays,

original: 'dod chags rdo rje'i 'od zer chen po 'phro zhing kun nas chags pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen brdzes pa //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje'i 'od zer chen po 'phro zhing kun nas chags pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen brdzes pa //
translated: with reddish-brown hair standing on end, radiating the great light rays of Passion Vajra,

original: gang gis rtse gcig rnam par bsams nas sum cu'i grong khyer lha mo'i lag pas yang dag 'khyud thob pa //
analyzed: gang gis rtse gcig rnam par bsams nas sum cu'i grong khyer lha mo'i lag pas yang dag 'khyud thob pa //
translated: having contemplated one-pointedly, one attains the embrace of the thirty-city goddess with one's hand.

original: 'gro ba rnams ni mtshungs pa med par dbang du mdzad pa sman rnams grub pa de la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams ni mtshungs pa med par dbang du mdzad pa sman rnams grub pa de la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having paid homage to that accomplished medicine, the incomparable one who brings beings under control,

original: dur khrod dang ni khyim dang ri brags phug ri ljongs shing drung dang ni yang na rang khyim mam //
analyzed: dur khrod dang ni khyim dang ri brags phug ri ljongs shing drung dang ni yang na rang khyim mam //
translated: in a charnel ground, a house, a mountain village, a cave, a park, at the foot of a tree, or in one's own home,

original: sa phyogs bar du gcod pa bral ba'i gnas ni 'ga' zhig tu yang bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug / dpal ldan kye yi rdo rje'i rim pas srid pa gsum po yongs gyur pa las zag med ye shes sku //
analyzed: sa phyogs bar du gcod pa bral ba'i gnas ni 'ga' zhig tu yang bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug / dpal ldan kye yi rdo rje'i rim pas srid pa gsum po yongs gyur pa las zag med ye shes sku //
translated: one should visualize the three worlds transformed into the body of the immaculate wisdom of glorious Hevajra.

original: bsgom bya autpal dmar po'i 'od kyis snang mdzad 'gro rnams srid dang myang 'das sgyu ma bzhin @201a * //
analyzed: bsgom bya autpal dmar po'i 'od kyis snang mdzad 'gro rnams srid dang myang 'das sgyu ma bzhin @201a * //
translated: The object of meditation is the light of the red lotus, which illuminates the world as an illusion of existence and nirvana.

original: du bsam // dang por sems can rnams la byams shing phan pa bu bzhin shin tu mnyes gshin gzugs ni rnam par bsam //
analyzed: du bsam // dang por sems can rnams la byams shing phan pa bu bzhin shin tu mnyes gshin gzugs ni rnam par bsam //
translated: First, one should visualize the form of a loving and helpful friend toward sentient beings, like a child.

original: sems can thams cad bu gcig na ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i rjes su brtse ba gang zhig bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bu gcig na ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i rjes su brtse ba gang zhig bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the compassion that follows the realization of all sentient beings as one's only child.

original: de rnams thar par mthong zhing phun tshogs kyis gang shin tu dga' bar gyur pa gzhan don gcig pu'i gzugs //
analyzed: de rnams thar par mthong zhing phun tshogs kyis gang shin tu dga' bar gyur pa gzhan don gcig pu'i gzugs //
translated: Seeing them liberated and filled with perfection, one should meditate on the form of the sole purpose of benefiting others.

original: phan dang mi phan blo gros dri ma sems can kun la stong pa nyid du btang snyoms bsgom par bya //
analyzed: phan dang mi phan blo gros dri ma sems can kun la stong pa nyid du btang snyoms bsgom par bya //
translated: The mind of benefit and harm is the impurity of the mind. One should meditate on equanimity toward all sentient beings as emptiness.

original: de nas thams cad rdzogs nas rang snying sgra ni brtag cing nyi ma la gnas hr'i: yig dmar po yi //
analyzed: de nas thams cad rdzogs nas rang snying sgra ni brtag cing nyi ma la gnas hr'i: yig dmar po yi //
translated: Then, when all is complete, one should examine one's own heart, and the syllable HRƒ™·∏§, red in color, should be visualized in the sun.

original: 'od zer rab tu 'phro bas bla ma dang ni bde gshegs sras bcas sangs rgyas rnams ni spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'phro bas bla ma dang ni bde gshegs sras bcas sangs rgyas rnams ni spyan drangs nas //
translated: Light radiates from it, and the Buddhas, the Gurus, and the Sugatas with their sons are invited.üîΩWhatever sins have been committed by me, or caused to be done, or consented to, in the various states of existence, I confess them all, O Assembly of Gurus and Deities.

original: 'khor ba'i skye gnas gang rnams su ni las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // rjes su yi rang rnams ni rab tu bshags bgyi gzhan yang dge ba rnams la de bzhin rjes yi rang //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i skye gnas gang rnams su ni las kyi sgrib pa gang zhig bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // rjes su yi rang rnams ni rab tu bshags bgyi gzhan yang dge ba rnams la de bzhin rjes yi rang //
translated: And I rejoice in the good deeds of all, and in the same way in the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: de rjes rnam pa kun bral bcom ldan 'das ma bla ma dam pa'i bka'i yis de bzhin shes gyur nas //
analyzed: de rjes rnam pa kun bral bcom ldan 'das ma bla ma dam pa'i bka'i yis de bzhin shes gyur nas //
translated: Then, having understood that the Blessed Lady is free from all forms, by the order of the holy Guru,

original: bsgom par bya ba de yi mdun du dpe med lhan cig skyes pa rgyal pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba de yi mdun du dpe med lhan cig skyes pa rgyal pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku //
translated: one should visualize in front of oneself the DharmakƒÅya, incomparable, innate, and victorious.

original: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa de bzhin srid pa gsum po rnams ni ma lus snar bar mdzad pa'i sku //
analyzed: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa de bzhin srid pa gsum po rnams ni ma lus snar bar mdzad pa'i sku //
translated: He is the Omniscient One, the Body which has reduced to nothing the three worlds.

original: phyogs rnams thams cad pha rol phyin pa mchog rnams yongs gyur mi shes de nyid de la de bzhin du //
analyzed: phyogs rnams thams cad pha rol phyin pa mchog rnams yongs gyur mi shes de nyid de la de bzhin du //
translated: All directions are completely transformed into the supreme perfections, and the one who does not know that reality is just like that

original: nub par gyur cing de la rnal 'byor pas ni smon lam las 'khrungs chos kyi sku nyid gyur pa ste //
analyzed: nub par gyur cing de la rnal 'byor pas ni smon lam las 'khrungs chos kyi sku nyid gyur pa ste //
translated: is submerged. The yogi, however, is born from the aspiration, and becomes the dharmakaya.

original: ngo bo nyid las skyes shing longs spyod rdzogs sku rang gi 'od zer gcig 'phro nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid las skyes shing longs spyod rdzogs sku rang gi 'od zer gcig 'phro nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: From the essence, the sambhogakaya is born, and from a single ray of its light, the mandala of the sun.

original: de la h'um yig sngon po'i 'od zer de nas shes shing sna tshogs rdo rje de yi bdag nyid la //
analyzed: de la h'um yig sngon po'i 'od zer de nas shes shing sna tshogs rdo rje de yi bdag nyid la //
translated: On that, the blue syllable hum radiates light rays, and from that, the vajra cross, which is its nature.

original: rab gur rnams mchog gi stobs can bdud kyi dpa' bo chen po rnams kyis dbye bar mi nus pa //
analyzed: rab gur rnams mchog gi stobs can bdud kyi dpa' bo chen po rnams kyis dbye bar mi nus pa //
translated: The great hero of the maras, the supreme powerful one, is not able to divide it.

original: phyi nas chu skyes dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra yi thig le dang // hr'i: yig las ni byung ba'i autpal dmar po'i steng du rnam par 'phro ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: phyi nas chu skyes dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra yi thig le dang // hr'i: yig las ni byung ba'i autpal dmar po'i steng du rnam par 'phro ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
translated: After that, on a red lotus, the bindu of sound, which is like the light of the sun, and from the syllable hri, a red utpala, on which is a radiating mandala of the sun.

original: de la mdun du khams gsum 'khor ba yi //
analyzed: de la mdun du khams gsum 'khor ba yi //
translated: In front of that, the three realms of samsaraüîΩ

original: nyi ma dmar chen 'bar ba la ni hr'i: //
analyzed: nyi ma dmar chen 'bar ba la ni hr'i: //
translated: In front of her, on the great blazing red sun of the three realms of cyclic existence, is hri·∏•.

original: lha mo'i mdun du shin tu 'bar ba yi //
analyzed: lha mo'i mdun du shin tu 'bar ba yi //
translated: In front of the goddess, the glorious fire burns intensely,

original: dpal gyi me yis bdud tshogs bsreg @201b mdzad pa //
analyzed: dpal gyi me yis bdud tshogs bsreg @201b mdzad pa //
translated: consuming the hosts of demons.

original: dang po'i ji bizhin  shin tu gsal ba yi //
analyzed: dang po'i ji bizhin  shin tu gsal ba yi //
translated: Just as before, the very clear

original: padma dmar po rab gsal snying po 'bar //
analyzed: padma dmar po rab gsal snying po 'bar //
translated: red lotus is blazing in the center.üîΩShe is red-orange, with disheveled hair, full breasts, and hips,

original: dmar ser skra brdzes nu ma sku smad dag / rgyas shing phyag rgyas rab sgeg nyams can ma //
analyzed: dmar ser skra brdzes nu ma sku smad dag / rgyas shing phyag rgyas rab sgeg nyams can ma //
translated: and is very graceful with the gestures.

original: spyan gsum dmar zhing g-yon du gzigs la chags //
analyzed: spyan gsum dmar zhing g-yon du gzigs la chags //
translated: Her three eyes are red and gaze to the left with passion.üîΩHer face bares its fangs and is radiant with light,

original: zhal ni mche ba gtsigs shing 'od kyis reg / zhal ni rab sgrogs ljags kyi rtse mo ni //
analyzed: zhal ni mche ba gtsigs shing 'od kyis reg / zhal ni rab sgrogs ljags kyi rtse mo ni //
translated: her face is wide open, and the tip of her tongue

original: gyen du bskyod cing 'od zer 'bar ba can //
analyzed: gyen du bskyod cing 'od zer 'bar ba can //
translated: is raised up, blazing with light rays.üîΩShe is stepping to the left with her right knee bent,

original: sna tshogs me ni 'phro zhing 'od zer 'bar ba'i ro ni 'gro bzhin pa la zhabs ni rtse mo chags //
analyzed: sna tshogs me ni 'phro zhing 'od zer 'bar ba'i ro ni 'gro bzhin pa la zhabs ni rtse mo chags //
translated: her left leg extended, and her toes touching the ground.

original: cig shos zhabs ni steng du rnam par bkod cing 'phro bzhin pa dang g-yon par shes pa'i gzugs can ma //
analyzed: cig shos zhabs ni steng du rnam par bkod cing 'phro bzhin pa dang g-yon par shes pa'i gzugs can ma //
translated: The other foot is placed above, extended and outstretched, and is known to be on the left.

original: rnam par 'phro ba'i rgya chen 'od zer lus kyis khyab cing sku smad lci zhing rgyas pas nges par chags //
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba'i rgya chen 'od zer lus kyis khyab cing sku smad lci zhing rgyas pas nges par chags //
translated: The body is pervaded by the great light rays that extend from it, and the lower body is heavy and full, certainly attached.

original: chu skyes dmar po rnam par bsnams shing mgul du mi mgo'i do shal phreng ba rab tu 'chang ba can //
analyzed: chu skyes dmar po rnam par bsnams shing mgul du mi mgo'i do shal phreng ba rab tu 'chang ba can //
translated: She holds a red lotus in her mouth and wears a garland of human heads around her neck.

original: sdong bu dang bcas autpal dmar po rgya cher rab tu rgyas shing 'phro ba gnyis 'phangs rtse bar byed //
analyzed: sdong bu dang bcas autpal dmar po rgya cher rab tu rgyas shing 'phro ba gnyis 'phangs rtse bar byed //
translated: She tosses two red lotuses with stems, fully blossomed and extended.

original: gzhu dang mda' ni rab tu rgyas pa gsal bar rna ba'i rtsa bar rgyud ni rab tu gang bar bkang //
analyzed: gzhu dang mda' ni rab tu rgyas pa gsal bar rna ba'i rtsa bar rgyud ni rab tu gang bar bkang //
translated: A bow and arrow are clearly placed at the base of her ears, filling the channel.

original: yum nyid sa gsum ma lus rnams ni mdun du lcags kyus 'gugs shing sa la 'gyel ba bzhin du byed //
analyzed: yum nyid sa gsum ma lus rnams ni mdun du lcags kyus 'gugs shing sa la 'gyel ba bzhin du byed //
translated: The mother herself, with a hook in front, draws all three worlds and makes them fall to the ground.

original: chu skyes dmar po phyag g-yon bsnams shing bla med lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyal srid de bzhin du //
analyzed: chu skyes dmar po phyag g-yon bsnams shing bla med lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyal srid de bzhin du //
translated: In his left hand he holds a red lotus, and with the supreme innate joy he rules the kingdom.

original: rang gi 'dod pas zla ba rab tu gsal zhing dpal ni nye bar dgod bzhin mi mgo'i thod pa lnga //
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pas zla ba rab tu gsal zhing dpal ni nye bar dgod bzhin mi mgo'i thod pa lnga //
translated: With his own desire he illuminates the moon and sets forth glory, and he wears a garland of five human skulls.

original: yan lag lnga la phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan cing yongs su gyur las sangs rgyas lnga ni rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: yan lag lnga la phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan cing yongs su gyur las sangs rgyas lnga ni rim pa bzhin //
translated: He is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments on his five limbs, and from the transformation of these, the five buddhas are in their proper order.

original: 'dod chags rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ma'i dbu la rnam brgyan de yi rang bzhin sgrub byed dbang po yis //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ma'i dbu la rnam brgyan de yi rang bzhin sgrub byed dbang po yis //
translated: The Blessed One is adorned on her head with RƒÅgavajrƒÅ, and her nature is accomplished by the sense organ.

original: de ni ma ning bzlas pas rgyal byed ji ltar lha rnams de yi zhabs la phyag ni 'tshal bar byed //
analyzed: de ni ma ning bzlas pas rgyal byed ji ltar lha rnams de yi zhabs la phyag ni 'tshal bar byed //
translated: She is the neuter mantra, and the victors pay homage at her feet.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs mchog gyur 'di ni gang zhig rol pas bzhugs pa'i bka' yis ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs mchog gyur 'di ni gang zhig rol pas bzhugs pa'i bka' yis ni //
translated: This supreme sƒÅdhana of the Blessed One is the one who resides in play by the command ofüîΩthe one who is the teacher of the ear, the one who is the one with compassion, and the one who is the one with the manifest.

original: snyan dang gas mkhan po brtse bas mngon brjod can gyi sgrub thabs bsod nams gang zhig bsags gyur pa //
analyzed: snyan dang gas mkhan po brtse bas mngon brjod can gyi sgrub thabs bsod nams gang zhig bsags gyur pa //
translated: Whatever merit has been accumulated by this sƒÅdhana,

original: de yis blo gros mun pa'i mtshan ma dang bral dri med shes rab rgyas shing 'phro ba can //
analyzed: de yis blo gros mun pa'i mtshan ma dang bral dri med shes rab rgyas shing 'phro ba can //
translated: which is free from the sign of the darkness of the mind, and which is the expansion and radiation of stainless wisdom.

original: rang gi 'dod pa rab brkyang 'od gsal bde ba chen pos 'gro rnams rab tu gnas gyur cig /
analyzed: rang gi 'dod pa rab brkyang 'od gsal bde ba chen pos 'gro rnams rab tu gnas gyur cig /
translated: May all beings be well-established in the great bliss of the clear light of the full extension of their desires.

original: @202a * // ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud las phyung ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: @202a * // ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud las phyung ba rdzogs so /
translated: The sƒÅdhana of KurukullƒÅ extracted from the ≈örƒ´ Hevajra Tantra is complete.

original: // / snyan ngag mkhan chen po brtse ba can zhes pas 'di tshigs su bcad par bsdebs pa'o//
analyzed: // / snyan ngag mkhan chen po brtse ba can zhes pas 'di tshigs su bcad par bsdebs pa'o//
translated: This was composed in verse by the great poet Maitrƒ´pƒÅda.
